body.name: Cowiewie Baby Swingable Bassinet Infant/Newborn to Toddler Bassinet with 4 Stages, Bedside Sleeper+Travel Cot+Bassinet+Playpen with Mattress, Breathable Net,6 Height Adjustable (Gray)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 2 mins
features: 👉🏆【MULTIPLE FUNCTION】Cowiewie bassinet can be used as a beside crib & Travel Cot & Swingable Bassinet & Playpen for baby or a bedside sleeper connected to an adult bed, Manufactured with soft skin-friendly fabric with both side breathable mesh design for make it easier for mom to take care of baby.👶👶

👉🏆ADJUSTABLE BABY BASSINET- 6 height levels of our baby bassinet, allow breastfeeding easier, while fitting for all parents. Besides, Bassinets is removable with zipper, which keeps baby from curious pets, mosquitos and other insects while creating a cozy sleep space.
👉🏆【BABY CRADLE MODE】Upgraded baby bassinet! Filp the bottom rocker of the bassinet can be converted into a baby cradle, better to soothe your baby to sleep.😍😍😍All the wheels can be detached.

👉🏆【ULTRA-STRONG BABY CRIB W/ STORAGE】The frame of our baby crib is made from strong, sturdy aluminum, with a reinforced frame beneath the bassinet, it will not tip or get knocked over. Besides, there is a storage basket can be hanging on the frame, make it easier to access baby’s essential things, like toys, diaper, baby bottle, etc.✔✔💪💪💪

👉🏆【SAFE & COMFORT】 Suitable from newborn to toddlers, this bedside bassinet is crafted with sturdy iron and aluminum frame, the wheels and the brakes system allow bassinet to move around easily or stand stably.💯💯💯It comes with a handy carry bag so you can take,with you on days out visiting friends and family, or on any weekend away.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cowiewie's baby bassinets are CPC, CPSIA and ASTM certified, we put your child's safety first. On the other hand, the bassinet with wheels is made of aircraft aluminum alloy frame for stable structure and good weight bearing

The Cowiewie Multi-functional Bassinet transforms into a bassinet, Bedside Sleeper, Playard Bassinet and Bassinet in seconds! The Cowiewie Playard Bassinet is the perfect size for your baby's free range of motion, the Game Bassinet, with its locking gimbaled wheels, has a strong load bearing capacity so that your baby can stay active and play inside the bassinet with a firm and stable grip! There are no gaps between the mattress and the bassinet, so baby can enjoy the bassinet with abandon, and the breathable visual mesh allows parents to interact with their baby at all times and keep an eye on them.The size is enough, the height has 6 adjustable gears (plus the lowest gear and game mode total 8 gears) adapt to all parents bed, you can and parents co-sleep. (Cowiewie Bassinet for newborns at night is active daily specially designed)Night coax the baby into a sweet dream, you can Bassinet seconds into rocking bassinet, freeing the parents arm, so that the baby in cowiewie rocking bassinet as if in the arm of the parents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works like a charm, great storage underneath!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One infant bed to rule them all…!!! Perfect for grandparents and multi baby visitors!
reviews.reviewText: So much intelligence built into one infant bed that actually grows and accommodates the infant.. and WoW!! This knocks it out of the park. Perfect for parents to use it the “in between time” before a little one moves into the nursery.. it offers so much convenient to both during day time naps or night time sleep. However, we chose for Grandparents house.. as it’s so IDEAL!! With new additions of a few grand babies this summer and fall, this x1 bed can meet all the needs by its simple adjustments. With a small footprint and wheel casters- it’s simple to move rooms for sleepovers with grandma or pull into guest room with a guest who has an infant Baby.. it accommodates baby stages perfectly!Easy “slide clip sides” adjust mattress height- allowing the bed to adapt to the needed stage or phase of an infant. Drop side is heavenly for mid of night feedings- you don’t even have to stand up when babé wakes up.. by a simple reach in and grab you can snag babe out of bed and onto you.. thank you!! Optional rocking motion is also a wow factor- something I actually missed when ordering.. this truly includes all the whistles and bells!Bed can also become that “extra set of hands” when you need to set the little one down, but want them near you.. wheel ability lets you bring bed along and keep them close- OR, if they fall asleep, it allows you to move them to quieter space! Perfect for a work from home mamas- As one who’s only 5’2”I LOVE THE HEIGHT! Taller adults may find its a bit more of a lean.. something to keep in mind.Included instruction let us build without issue.. we used x2 adults to set up and completed in x30min. But, it’s a must to read along step by step! Overall, this has stability… feels of a solid option to last thru child rearing years! Ample storage below to keep diapers, wipes, extra blankets etc. unisex color for boy/girl. This is a solid option for spoiler or gift- One I’m sure will be greatly appreciated! Hoping info can help you all- stay safe everyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great bassinet to use at home
reviews.reviewText: This combo bassinet is very functional for the infant stage. It’s easy to assemble and isn’t too heavy or bulky. It has good storage for a little diaper changing station. The rocking feature is nice and not noisy with movement. Even though the size is nice for a bedside bassinet I don’t think I would use for travel because it would take up too much space in a car or would be a hassle to lug around to hotels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice swinging bassinet for babies/toddlers. You can use it as a bedside sleeper, travel cot, bassinet, or a playpen. It is very versatile for all your needs. It comes with a mattress, breathable net, and the height can be adjusted. With the adjustable height, you will not have to bend over or reach as far which is better for your back.The bassinet also has wheels and is very mobile so you can roll it around instead of having to lifting/carrying it to other spaces. There is a storage area underneath for you to store baby/toddler items. When it is in playpen mode, you won't be able to access the storage area so keep that in mind. The quality is good and well made so it should last. This bassinet is good value and will be a great addition to your nursery providing a safe/comfortable environment for your little ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great item to add to your nursery if you are expecting a baby or have a newborn. This bassinet is very versatile and can "grow" with your baby and adjust based on your and baby's needs. It can be used as a stand-alone basinet, or as a co-sleeper, or - once the baby outgrows the bassinet stage, it can convert to a playpen or travel crib.When used as a bassinet/co-sleeper, the height is adjustable, which is great to reduce strain on your lower back when leaning over/picking the baby up. The bassinet has wheels and can be moved around easily. It has a storage shelf on the bottom to make extra blankets, diapers (or whatever you want to put there) within reach. Once the bassinet is converted into the playpen that shelf becomes inaccessible, though, but, perhaps, there's less need for it at that point.The overall construction is sturdy and the quality seems nice.At the time of this review this bassinet is priced lower than name brand competitors, which makes this a sensible choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for both sleep and play!
reviews.reviewText: This bassinet by cowiewie is a great versatile bassinet for both sleep and play time.It can be used as a small play area for babies but can also be used as a sleep bassinet on its own or by the bedside.It is very durable and well made with wheels that allow for easy movement.It is easy to assemble with all the included parts. It only took about 20 minutes to assemble.This is a great product and I recommend it to parents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great bassinette and versatile playpen.
reviews.reviewText: I like that this bassinette has adjustable floor, this allows for my baby have more room when older. The frame is made out of good quality steel and feel very sturdy. I can easily rolls the baby around in it and don't worry about it tipping over. It assembled very quickly I think it took me only 20 minutes to setup everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the versatility!
reviews.reviewText: This bassinet is awesome for someone bringing home their new addition! The fact that it has the ability to be converted in to different stages or uses makes this a total must have! It is easily assembled and once you have done so you will have a piece of furniture that you can raise and lower in height or setup to provide the best possible sleeping environment for your little one. And not only is this a sleeping area you can also use as a playpen. Given all the different uses for this bassinet it is great value item that will eliminate the need to purchase separate pieces like a playpen, travel sleeper etc., saving you money and freeing up space in your home
